file_content.text: The shuttle is waiting for you in the shuttle bay, Lieutenant. Good luck out there.
General, with all due respect, how can you do this? I've served with your Infantry Command for years.
That's enough, Jorgan. This wasn't my choice. But a defection of this scale--someone has to swing, and the powers that be say it's you.
What's going on here?
Reporting for debrief.
I guess word of the defection is traveling fast.
So, you know about my squad.
In a little hot water there, Lieutenant?
Jorgan's finally in trouble?
Your squad full of traitors just destroyed my career, Sergeant. Command can't punish them, so they're burning me instead.
I told you, Jorgan, that's enough! You're removed from your post and demoted to sergeant, effective immediately. Now fall in line, soldier!
Yes, sir, General, sir.
General, sir, no one could have seen this coming.
Jorgan shouldn't be punished.
Just stay out of it, Sergeant.
Does this mean I can get his job?
Is Jorgan's position open now?
Guess this means I won't have to take anymore of your attitude--Sergeant.
Not so big now, huh, Jorgan?
I can't believe this....
You must be our last loyal Havoc member. I'm General Vander, Republic chief of operations for Ord Mantell. It's a pleasure to finally meet you.
On behalf of the Republic and the people of Ord Mantell, I want to thank and congratulate you for your courageous actions in disabling the stolen ZR-57.
Your heroic efforts saved countless innocent lives. In recognition of your valiant service, I hereby promote you to the rank of lieutenant. Congratulations.
Thank you, sir.
This is just too good to be true.
I outrank Jorgan now?
Congratulations. Sir.
It's about time I saw some rewards for everything I accomplished here.
I deserve this.
That's right, Lieutenant. You've worked hard--you've earned this.
Now, Lieutenant, as the last remaining member of Havoc, the duty of rebuilding the squad falls to you. Havoc is your command.
To get the process started, I've decided to assign Sergeant Jorgan here as Havoc's first new member.
I'd be glad to have you in the unit, Jorgan.
Sounds good to me.
We're going to have a lot of fun together, Sergeant Jorgan.
My very first subordinate!
I'll take the Havoc patch and sergeant stripes if it means I get to grind them into Tavus's face before we kill him.
With all due respect, General, I don't want this pathetic excuse for a soldier in my unit.
Not a chance.
In spite of what's happened, Jorgan is still one of the finest officers in the entire Republic Army.
If it means getting a shot at Tavus, I'll do whatever it takes.
This is the best I can do for you, Jorgan. You're a good man, and we need good people now more than ever.
I don't know what Tavus is planning, but he knows the inner workings of our military better than anyone. The destruction that he could cause is limitless.
Have we been able to get a fix on where the traitors are heading?
Where is Tavus now?
Unfortunately, no. They slipped offworld before we could mobilize to track them. You'll have to hunt them down, Lieutenant. I hope you're prepared.
I won't allow Tavus and the others to harm the Republic, sir.
That won't happen.
I'm going to kill every single one of those traitors if it's the last thing I do.
Those cowards are dead meat.
Just don't underestimate them, Lieutenant. Tavus and his followers won't be easy to take down.
In any case, your work here is done. I've got a shuttle prepped--you're going to Coruscant for your next assignment.
When you arrive on Coruscant, report immediately to the head of SpecForce division, General Garza. She'll be issuing your orders from now on.
Very well.
The head of Special Forces, huh? This just keeps getting better.
Wow, I'm really moving up.
General Garza is a great woman. You're fortunate to have this opportunity to work with her, in spite of the circumstances.
I'm hunting Tavus down--I hope General Garza's on board with that.
She'd better not hold me back.
General Garza will do whatever is best for the situation, Lieutenant. And you'd do well to stow the attitude before you meet her.
You'd better get to your shuttle. It's waiting for you in the landing bay.
It's been an honor having you here. Good luck in all of your future missions.
It's been an honor to serve on Ord Mantell.
Thank you, sir.
I'll be fine.
Best to have some anyway. Lieutenant, Sergeant, you're dismissed.
It's going to feel really good to get off this rock.
I can't wait to leave.
Lieutenant, Sergeant, you're dismissed. I hope I see you again someday.
Hello there.
